inspiracio.xml.sax
Class IndentingContentHandler

java.lang.Object
  inspiracio.xml.sax.ContentHandlerWrapper
      inspiracio.xml.sax.IndentingContentHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler
public class IndentingContentHandler
extends ContentHandlerWrapper

A content handler that writes every XML element on a new line, and indents the nested elements.

Puts every opening tag and every closing tag on a line by itself, and all the content of the element is indented.

You could spend a lot of time making it better.
